text:
This is a link to my submission for a PATCH to the XMLValidate task.

We are using this currently to validate XML documents against an XSD schema.
You can set arbitrary parameters of the SAX parsers.

I have created this here so it does get lost.
creator: nick@svana.org
antoine@apache.org
text:
This was actually submitted by Stefan Bodewig :
revision 1.26
date: 2002/09/23 14:59:42;  author: bodewig;  state: Exp;  lines: +96 -24
Add ability to set parser features in <xmlvalidate>.

Submitted by:	Nick Pellow
